info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 01 at 4:56PM EDT until July 01 at 5:45PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mount Holly NJ has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Berks County in eastern Pennsylvania... * Until 545 PM EDT. * At 456 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Strausstown, or near Schuylkill Haven, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Wind damage to roofs, siding, trees, and power lines is possible. * Locations impacted include... Kutztown, Hamburg, Fleetwood, Leesport, Shoemakersville, Bernville, Strausstown, Lenhartsville, Fairview Hgts and Centerport. This includes Interstate 78 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 19 and 41. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
